name: Sky Islands
description:
You are a plane tasked with flying to each of the burning islands and extinguishing them to keep the trees safe. Press 'SPACE' to dump your water on the fires and extinguish them before time runs out.

If you need to get there quicker, hold down 'W' for a speed boost. Your little engine can't take much though, so it will only help a bit. And make sure you stay in the fly zone, otherwise you will lose some time!

Thank you so much for playing our mini game! This was created a while ago for a weekend game jam, and while it isn't the greatest game ever, it is the first one we ever made and released. We are very proud of it.

If you liked it, rate and comment, and please follow us on Twitter to keep up to date with our latest projects.
